text: Juna uddesyale tiniharu yasala'i sundachan, unako niyatasamga hami ramrari paricita chaum. Jaba tiniharule tapa'itarpha kana thapiraheka hunchan, taba pani ra jaba tiniharule saraâ€“sallaha gardachan taba pani jaba yi atyacariharule bhandachan ki timi usako anukarana gariraheka chau jasamathi jadu gari'eko cha
